mapper.insert: INSERT INTO quant_stock_signal ( wind_code, stock_name, strategy_name, signal_type, trigger_price, signal_time, trade_date, show_status, risk_snapshot ) VALUES ( #{windCode}, #{stockName}, #{strategyName}, #{signalType}, #{triggerPrice}, #{signalTime}, #{tradeDate}, #{showStatus}, #{riskSnapshot} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE stock_name = VALUES(stock_name), signal_type = VALUES(signal_type), trigger_price = VALUES(trigger_price), signal_time = VALUES(signal_time), show_status = VALUES(show_status), risk_snapshot = VALUES(risk_snapshot), update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM quant_stock_signal WHERE trade_date = #{tradeDate} AND show_status = 1 ORDER BY signal_time DESC
